mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DELIVERY (DELIVERY_NO, DELIVERY_NAME, DELIVERY_ADDRESS, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_NUMBER, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_PHONE, DELIVERY_CLASS, USER_NO) VALUES (DELIVERY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{delivery_name}, #{delivery_address}, #{delivery_address_number}, #{delivery_address_phone}, #{delivery_class}, #{user_no})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DELIVERY WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND DELIVERY_ARRIVAL_DATE IS NULL AND DELIVERY_CLASS = #{delivery_class}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DELIVERY WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND DELIVERY_CLASS = '기본배송지'
